config.title: PDF Engine
values: Leave the choice to latexmk (based on latexmkrc files, if any)
config.description: Choose the default engine used to build PDF files. Each project can override this choice in its Project Settings.

config.title: Skim Behavior
values: Do not bring Skim to the foreground

config.title: Skim Path
config.description: Make sure that Nova is selected in Skim’s PDF–TeX Sync preferences, as explained in the Extension Help.

config.title: Latexmk Path
config.description: Latexmk is included in standard MacTeX installations (in which case its path should be /Library/TeX/texbin/latexmk).

config.title: Language Server Path
config.description: The recommended LaTeX language server is TexLab, available via Homebrew (in which case its path should be /opt/homebrew/bin/texlab on Apple Silicon Macs, or /usr/local/bin/texlab on Intel Macs).

configWorkspace.title: PDF Engine
values: Leave the choice to latexmk (based on latexmkrc files, if any)
configWorkspace.description: If nothing is selected, then the choice in the Extension Preferences is used.
